title: Concerning the impossible
context: Tell your boss that a requested task literally cannot be done.

content.bestLine: It's literally not feasible with our current resources

informal.text: No way we can do that
We're not set up for that

formal.text: It is not a viable option
We do not have the necessary resources
It is not feasible at this time
We are not capable of completing that task
It is not a realistic goal
We do not have the expertise to accomplish that

patterns.template: We can't [options] with our current resources
patterns.meaning: expressing inability to complete a task

patterns.template: It's not [options] for us to complete that task
patterns.meaning: expressing impossibility of completing a task

dialogs.description: Informing the boss of an impossible task

lines.speaker: Employee
lines.text: I've reviewed the project requirements, and I have to say, it's literally not feasible with our current resources

lines.speaker: Boss
lines.text: What do you mean? Can't we just work harder to get it done?

lines.speaker: Employee
lines.text: I understand where you're coming from, but we're talking about a fundamental limitation here. We just don't have the capability to make it work

dialogs.description: Discussing an impossible task with a team member

lines.speaker: Team Member
lines.text: Hey, have you started working on that new project task yet?

lines.speaker: Employee
lines.text: Actually, I've been looking into it, and I think we need to reassess. It's just not viable for us to complete that task

lines.speaker: Team Member
lines.text: Really? What makes you say that?

lines.speaker: Employee
lines.text: Well, we're talking about a scope that's beyond our current expertise and resources. We'd need to bring in external help or significantly adjust our approach
